name: @nihilux/roon-web-stack
description: a web stack, from api to web client, to use roon ia a browser
author: nihil@nihilux.org

scripts.build: yarn echo:title -- 'Building the stack' && yarn workspaces foreach -At run build
scripts.clean: yarn echo:title -- 'Cleaning the stack' && yarn workspaces foreach -At run clean
scripts.lint: yarn echo:title -- 'Linting the stack' && yarn workspaces foreach -At run lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn echo:title -- 'Linting and fixing the stack' && yarn workspaces foreach -At run lint:fix
scripts.test: yarn echo:title -- 'Testing the stack' && yarn workspaces foreach -At run test
scripts.backend: yarn echo:title -- 'Starting the backend' && yarn workspace @nihilux/roon-web-api start
scripts.frontend: yarn echo:title -- 'Starting the frontend' && yarn workspace @nihilux/roon-web-ng-client start
scripts.install:immutable: yarn echo:title -- 'Installing immutable dependencies for the stack' && yarn install --immutable
scripts.install:docker: yarn echo:title -- 'Installing prod dependencies for api in Docker' && yarn workspaces focus @nihilux/roon-web-api --production
scripts.ci: yarn echo:title -- 'Ci for the stack' && yarn install:immutable && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn lint && yarn test
scripts.cd: yarn echo:title -- 'Cd build for the stack' && yarn install:immutable && yarn clean && yarn build
